info.author: c0ding
info.description:
Get Jenkins build notifications on OSX.

Installation:
-------------

From source use

::

        $ python setup.py install

or install from PyPi

::

        $ pip install wylie

Requirements:
-------------

-  `pync`_
-  `lxml`_
-  `python-requests`_

Todo:
-----

-  Linux support (maybe using libnotifiy?)

info.html_description:
Get Jenkins build notifications on OSX.

Installation:

From source use

$ python setup.py install

or install from PyPi

$ pip install wylie

Requirements:

  • pync
  • lxml
  • python-requests

Todo:

  • Linux support (maybe using libnotifiy?)
